seo.description: Understand the ICF-aligned principles, feel, ethics, and standards that ground SustainSage coaching sessions.

hero.title: Our coaching approach
hero.subtitle: Grounded in ICF principles, held with cultural sensitivity, and paced so you stay in choice.

grounding.title: What grounds our practice
grounding.description: SustainSage coaches are credentialed with the International Coaching Federation (ICF). We translate its ethics and core competencies into daily habits that protect your agency and context.

items.title: ICF Code of Ethics in practice
items.description: We contract clearly, hold confidentiality with agreed limits, and keep the partnership client-led, as outlined by the ICF core competencies.

items.title: Trauma-aware, not trauma-therapy
items.description: We recognise how nervous systems react under pressure, slowing down or pausing when needed, and we refer out when therapeutic care is the safer fit.

items.title: Multilingual and intersectional sensitivity
items.description: Sessions can move between English, Mandarin, or mixed registers. We actively name power dynamics and design choices that respect culture, identities, and access.

feel.title: How sessions feel
feel.description: Expect a collaborative, reflective space. Each session begins with what matters most to you, and we co-create the pace, tools, and accountability that match your capacity.
items: Unhurried conversations—silence and pacing are welcome, and we do not rush decisions or force breakthroughs.
Structure with freedom—you set the focus while we offer frameworks, reflections, and experiments to work with.
Genuine curiosity—we regularly ask “Does this actually serve you?” and adapt based on what you say.
Grounded encouragement—no toxic positivity, just honest acknowledgement of effort, context, and limits.

ethics.title: Ethics & boundaries
ethics.description: Boundaries keep coaching purposeful and safe. We align every decision with the ICF ethical framework and our commitment to do no harm.

items.title: Coaching only
items.description: We do not diagnose, treat trauma, or offer legal, immigration, or medical advice.

items.title: Clear agreements
items.description: Every package includes written contracting on goals, logistics, data handling, and fees.

items.title: Safeguarding first
items.description: If risks surface beyond coaching scope, we pause and point you to specialised resources.

standards.title: How we keep standards
standards.description: Coaching is a profession, not a side gig. We invest in the structures that keep our practice accountable to you and to the wider coaching community.

items.title: Ongoing supervision and CPD
items.description: We meet regularly with ICF-accredited supervisors and invest in annual training to stay sharp.

items.title: Reflective practice
items.description: We debrief themes, bias, and systemic impact after sessions to keep learning.

items.title: Honest referrals
items.description: When coaching is not the right container, we name it early and connect you with alternative supports instead of holding you to a package.
